!Head Blacksmith Vergara: Ah, yes! The forthrightness of a true royal! I'll get right to the point. Here is a list of the coins I want and what I have to offer in exchange. Being in the warehouse business, I've acquired many rare and precious items. I'm offering them to you at an exceptional price. Don't miss this great opportunity!
